meanings.definition: The measurement of the angles and intensities of diffracted X-rays or other radiation.
meanings.sent1: Diffractometry helps scientists analyze how X-rays bend.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use diffractometry to understand the patterns of diffracted X-rays.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the diffractometry machine suddenly started playing music.
meanings.sent4: The diffractometry results revealed a hidden structure in the X-ray pattern.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of diffractometry lies in its ability to unveil hidden details in radiation patterns.
